Our last day in Sweden! Beautiful 90km day along a coastal bike path from Bastad to Grevie. We hiked up to Helsingborg castle and took the ferry to Helsingor. We toured the Kronborg castle, which Shakespeare based Hamlet, and watched people beaching and fishing on the grounds.
